arts.ttl: Monza vs. Udinese to finish off matchday 15
arts.sum: Monza are one of three teams that Udinese have faced at least four times in the last three Serie A seasons (since 2022/23) without ever losing, together with Empoli and Sassuolo: the Friulians have one win and three draws against the Brianza team in the period. Six of the last seven league matches between Monza and Udinese have ended in a draw â€“ the other result was a 2-1 Udinese win on 26 August 2022 in Serie A (goals by Beto, Udogie and Colpani).
